Know My City
Coffee Shops
Location List
Restaurants
Kid Friendly Places
Parks
Shopping Centers
%d Details
Top Beans Coffee and More
1436 Sanusi Fafuriwa street, Victoria Island, Lagos, 106104 Lagos
Known for its warm atmosphere and extensive menu, including a standout Japanese cheesecake.
Vestar Coffee
26A Oju Olobun Close, Victoria Island
Offers premium quality, small-batch handcrafted coffee in a minimalist modern setting.
MyYa\'s Cafe
Plot 6 Muiz Banire Street, Lekki PhaseII, Lagos 100001, Lagos
A pocket-friendly spot offering a serene environment for work or relaxation with locally sourced smoothies.
Bubble Tii (BOBA)
Aaron\'s Mail, Olabunmi Owo Street, Lekki PhaseI, Suit 16, Lagos 550104

A fun blend of natural, organic, fresh bubble tea or "boba tea" drinks. Located in the heart of Lekki Phase1. Bubbletii, serves yummy Hong Kong Egg Waffles (Bubble waffles), Fresh filled donuts and apple crumble tarts. All drinks are handcrafted and topped with natural tapioca balls, fruit jellies and or popping boba to finish. The café also serves hot croissant, fresh juices and coffee. With gluten free and vegan options everyone can have an experiential treat.
La Pointe Café
4A Akin Olugbade Street, off Idowu Martins Street, Victoria Island, Lagos
Known for its homely atmosphere and Starbucks coffee, perfect for a quick breakfast date.
Delis Coffee
1291 Akin Adesola Street, Victoria Island
Found at 1291 Akin Adesola Street, Victoria Island, Delis Coffee offers a variety of coffee drinks, gourmet sandwiches, and a relaxing bar-meets-café atmosphere.
Hans & Rene
1A Ozumba Mbadiwe Ave, Victoria Island, Lagos 106104, Lagos

A boutique café and gelateria offering a wide variety of pastries, cakes, and over 40 flavors of gelato and sorbets.Located at 1a Ozumba Mbadiwe Avenue, Victoria Island, this boutique café offers a variety of gelato flavors, freshly baked pastries, and other treats in a stylish setting.
Art Cafe
282 Akin Olugbade, off Idowu Martins, Victoria Island, Lagos
A multi-faceted space that includes a café, art gallery, and dance studio, perfect for enjoying a cup of coffee while appreciating art.
Pause Café & Espresso Bar
1 Bisway Street, Maroko Lekki 106014, Lagos
Ideal for a relaxed outing with its picturesque outdoor setting and diverse menu.
Caffe Tranche by Araba
148 Olosa street, off Karim Kontu, Lagos
This café provides a relaxing oasis with an outdoor space adorned with palm trees, ideal for a relaxing date or Sunday brunch.
Rufus And Bee
Okunde Bluewaters scheme Twinwaters Lagos, off Remi Olowude St, Eti-Osa, Lekk
This entertainment center offers a variety of arcade games, bowling, and a Tex-Mex restaurant, making it a fun spot for both kids and adults.
Omu Resort
1 Asiwaju Bola Tinubu Wy, Ibeju, Lekki 105101, Lagos
A popular destination for families, Omu Resort in Ibeju Lekki offers a zoo, amusement park, and water park, set in a lush environment.
Maxtivity
Landmark Beach, 4 Water Corporation Dr, Oniru, Lagos
This family entertainment center at Circle Mall in Lekki offers a variety of attractions including bumper cars, soft play, arcade games, and climbing walls.
FunVille
Akin Adesola St, Victoria Island, Lagos 101241, Lagos
An indoor playground in Victoria Island, Funville is designed for kids aged 3 to 12, with activities and a small diner on site.
Funtopia Leisure Resort
Lekki Estate Phase 1, Ibeju Lekki, Lekki

Funtopia located in Ibeju-Lekki, Lagos is an ideal children’s world. There are fun sections for kids below the age of three; parents can have fun with their children when they play, swim and enjoy several water sports. There are also arcade and computer games in ‘Cusco city’, billiards and table tennis in ‘The Shed’ and a wide variety of other activities to keep your children entertained.
Whispering Palms
Whispering Palms Iworo Road Turn at Aradagun Bus Stop Do NOT branch at Mowo Town, Off Lagos Badagry Express Way, Amuwo Odofin, Badagry 100101, Lagos
A resort offering ecological and aquatic tourism along the Lagos Lagoon, Whispering Palms provides a peaceful getaway with activities for both relaxation and fun.
Lekki Leisure Lake
CFF6+FVW, Lekki Leisure Lake, Adekunle Animashaun Drive, Marwa, Off Lekki Phase 1, Lekki, Adekunle Animashaun Dr, Eti-Osa, Lagos 106104
This lakeside resort offers various water sports, quad biking, and other outdoor activities, ideal for an adventurous family day out.
Dream World Africana
First Right Turn After The 2nd Tollgate KM 20 Lekki-Ajah Expressway, Lekki Penninsula II, Lekki

Dreamworld Africana is an amusement and theme park situated in Lekki, Lagos State. Established in 2018, Dreamworld covers an area of 10 acres and re-opened to the public in 2013. The park is one of the main amusement parks in the city. The park provides many attractions to keep its visitors excited.Dreamworld Africana is an amusement park featuring various rides and attractions for children, including carousels, roller coasters, and a play area. It’s a great place for families to spend a fun-filled day.
Popsicle by Happy Hour
8 Olajumoke Obasa Cl, Alaka, Lagos 101241, Lagos

This spot offers a delightful experience for kids with a sweet tooth. Located at Town Square Mall in Magodo, it serves a wide variety of popsicles in different flavors, perfect for a cool treat on a hot day.
Hakuna Matata Theme Park
Eko Atlantic City, Ahmadu Bello Wy, Victoria Island, Lagos 106104, Lagos
Divided into wet and dry zones, this theme park offers a range of fun activities, including slides, small pools, and playgrounds. It’s an excellent choice for a family day out with young children​
Shiro Lagos
Block XVI 3 & 4 Victoria Island Oniru Estate, Eti-Osa, Lagos 101241
Known for its Pan-Asian cuisine, Shiro is a popular upscale spot for sushi and other Asian-inspired dish. Has outdoor seating · Serves great cocktails · Serves vegan dishes
Cactus Restaurant
20/24 Ozumba Mbadiwe Ave, Victoria Island, Lagos 106104, Lagos
Offers a combination of international cuisine and bakery delights, located on Victoria Island. Has all you can eat · Has outdoor seating · Serves great cocktails
Z Kitchen
19 Saka Tinubu St, Victoria Island, Lagos 106104, Lagos

A stylish restaurant serving international cuisine with a modern touch. Upscale international cuisine & cocktails in a chic setting with a smoking patio & 2 bars. Reservations required · Has all you can eat · Has outdoor seating
